attributes.action: make politics a compulsory lesson in all secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young members of society nowadays seem to be increasingly disillusioned with politics. This leads to voter apathy and hence low turnout at elections. Making politics compulsory in secondary schools will educate the future of our country to feel involved in politics and will increase, eventually, increase voter turnout come election time. Please sign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
